t: Ord. No. 2001-11. AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AMENDING CHAPTER 19.10 SO AS TO ESTABLISH A NEW ZONING DISTRICT "RE - RESIDENTIAL ESTATE" AND TO ADOPT CERTAIN DEVELOPMENT STANDARDS FOR THAT DISTRICT; AMENDING THE ZONING MAP TO CHANGE THE ZONING DESIGNATION OF CERTAIN PROPERTIES TO APPLY THE NEW "RE-RESIDENTIAL ESTATE" DESIGNATION; AMENDING THE ZONING MAP FOR CERTAIN PROPERTIES TO BE CONSISTENT WITH THE GENERAL PLAN LAND USE MAP; AND THE ACCEPTANCE OF A NEGATIVE DECLARATION.
sp: library|us/ca/cities/american-canyon/ordinances|2001|City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2001-11
